TF039747-PAPUA NEW GUINEA -  SAL III -
            STRUCTURAL REFORM,TF039787-PAPUA NEW GUINEA - STRUCTURAL
            REFORM IN PNG,TF040692-PAPUA NEW GUINEA: GOVERNANCE
            PROMOTION ADJUSTMENT LOAN

abstracts.cdata!:
The Eligibility Report for the
            Governance Promotion Adjustment Loan (GPAL) for Papua New
            Guinea outlines the request for inspection details. The
            Requesters claim that Management, in violation of the terms
            and conditions under which the Board of Executive Directors
            approved the GPAL, intends to release its last tranche,
            despite the fact that the Borrower, i.e. the Government, has
            not complied with disbursement conditions related to
            forestry management. In Management's opinion, the
            Bank's actions related to the GPAL were in compliance
            with the relevant policies and procedures. To determine the
            eligibility of the Request and the Requesters, the Panel
            reviewed the Request and Management's Response. In the
            Panel's view, the evident harm suffered by the
            Requesters is not related to an act or omission of the Bank
            and the Panel does not recommend an investigation into the
            matter alleged in the Request.
